sentences.en: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
sentences.cn: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

sentences.en: For the prior year, they reported net income of $1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 他们公布上一年度纯收入为110万美元。

sentences.en: He called for an increase of 1p on income tax.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁所得税提高1便士。

sentences.en: He was convicted of filing false income tax returns.
sentences.cn: 他因为在纳税申报表上作假而被定罪。

sentences.en: People on income support do not have to pay council tax.
sentences.cn: 领取收入补贴的人不必缴纳市政税。

sentences.en: Shares and bonds can bring one quite a considerable additional income.
sentences.cn: 股票和债券能给人带来不菲的额外收入。

sentences.en: She suggests you first assess your income and outgoings.
sentences.cn: 她建议你先估算一下自己的收入和开销。

sentences.en: Somalia, pop. 7.9 million, income per head about £1.60 a week.
sentences.cn: 索马里，人口790万，人均收入大约每周1.60英镑。

sentences.en: Someone with an income of $34,895 can afford this loan.
sentences.cn: 一个收入为34,895美元的人能负担得起这笔贷款。

sentences.en: The extra income has meant Phillippa can tuck away the rent.
sentences.cn: 额外的收入意味着菲莉帕可以把房租的钱存起来。

sentences.en: The newspaper used the neologism "dinks", Double Income No Kids.
sentences.cn: 报纸使用了新词“丁克族”，即“双收入无子女”。

sentences.en: The riots will also mean lost income for Los Angeles County.
sentences.cn: 暴乱还意味着洛杉矶县收入的损失。

sentences.en: There has been a falling-off in box office income and other earnings.
sentences.cn: 票房及其他收入已经下降。

sentences.en: They enjoyed an income and lifestyle that many people would envy.
sentences.cn: 他们的收入和生活方式会令很多人都羡慕不已。

sentences.en: Tourism is up, jobs are up, individual income is up.
sentences.cn: 旅游火了，工作机会多了，个人收入涨了。

trans.tran_en: the money that you earn from your work or that you receive from investments, the government etc
